org.apache.poi.ss.formula

Class DataValidationEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ss.formula.DataValidationEvaluator

  • public class DataValidationEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    Evaluates Data Validation constraints.

    For performance reasons, this class keeps a cache of all previously retrieved DataValidation instances. Be sure to call clearAllCachedValues() if any workbook validation definitions are added, modified, or deleted.

    Changing cell values should be fine, as long as the corresponding WorkbookEvaluator.clearAllCachedResultValues() is called as well.

    (评估数据验证约束。出于性能原因，此类保留了之前检索到的所有DataVal实例的缓存。如果添加、修改或删除任何工作簿验证定义，请务必调用clearAllCachedValues（）。更改单元格值应该可以，只要也调用相应的WorkbookEvferator.clearAllCachedResultValues（）即可。)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataValidationEvaluator.DataValidationContext
      This class organizes and encapsulates all the pieces of information related to a single data validation configuration for a single cell.(此类组织和封装与单个单元的单个数据验证配置相关的所有信息。)
      static class  DataValidationEvaluator.OperatorEnum
      Not calling it OperatorType to avoid confusion for now with DataValidationConstraint.OperatorType.(暂时不称其为OperatorType，以避免与DataValidationUtilint.OperatorType混淆。)
      static class  DataValidationEvaluator.ValidationEnum
      Not calling it ValidationType to avoid confusion for now with DataValidationConstraint.ValidationType.(不将其称为ValidationType是为了避免与DataValidationConstraint.ValidationType混淆。)

      DataValidationEvaluator(Workbook wb, WorkbookEvaluatorProvider provider)

      void clearAllCachedValues()
      Call this whenever validation structures change, so future results stay in sync with the Workbook state.(每当验证结构发生变化时，都会调用此命令，以便未来的结果与工作簿状态保持同步。)

      Finds and returns the DataValidationEvaluator.DataValidationContext for the cell, if there is one.(查找并返回单元格的DataGuardationEvolator. DataGuardationContent（如果有的话）。)

      Finds and returns the DataValidation for the cell, if there is one.(查找并返回单元格的数据验证（如果有的话）。)

      If getValidationForCell(CellReference) returns an instance, and the DataValidationConstraint.ValidationType is DataValidationConstraint.ValidationType.LIST, return the valid values, whether they are from a static list or cell range.(如果getGuardationForCell（CellReference）返回实例，并且DataGuardationBindition.ValidationType为DataGuardationBindition.ValidationType. RST，则返回有效值，无论它们来自静态列表还是单元格范围。)

        evaluator(评估器)

      • clearAllCachedValues

        public void clearAllCachedValues()
        Call this whenever validation structures change, so future results stay in sync with the Workbook state.(每当验证结构发生变化时，都会调用此命令，以便未来的结果与工作簿状态保持同步。)

      • getValidationForCell

        public DataValidation getValidationForCell(CellReference cell)
        Finds and returns the DataValidation for the cell, if there is one. Lookup is based on the first match from DataValidation.getRegions() for the cell's sheet. DataValidation regions must be in the same sheet as the DataValidation. Allowed values expressions may reference other sheets, however.(查找并返回单元格的数据验证（如果有的话）。收件箱基于单元格工作表的数据验证.getRegions（）中的第一个匹配项。数据验证区域必须与数据验证位于同一工作表中。但是，允许的值表达可能会引用其他表。)
        Parameters:
        cell - reference to check - use this in case the cell does not actually exist yet(单元格-要检查的引用-如果单元格实际上还不存在，请使用它)
        Returns:
        the DataValidation applicable to the given cell, or null if no validation applies(适用于给定单元格的数据验证，如果不适用验证，则为空)

      • getValidationContextForCell

        public DataValidationEvaluator.DataValidationContext getValidationContextForCell(CellReference cell)
        Finds and returns the DataValidationEvaluator.DataValidationContext for the cell, if there is one. Lookup is based on the first match from DataValidation.getRegions() for the cell's sheet. DataValidation regions must be in the same sheet as the DataValidation. Allowed values expressions may reference other sheets, however.(查找并返回单元格的DataGuardationEvolator. DataGuardationContent（如果有的话）。收件箱基于单元格工作表的数据验证.getRegions（）中的第一个匹配项。数据验证区域必须与数据验证位于同一工作表中。但是，允许的值表达可能会引用其他表。)
        Parameters:
        cell - reference to check(单元格-参考检查)
        Returns:
        the DataValidationContext applicable to the given cell, or null if no validation applies(适用于给定单元格的数据验证上下文，如果不适用验证，则为空)

      • getValidationValuesForCell

        public java.util.List<ValueEval> getValidationValuesForCell(CellReference cell)
        If getValidationForCell(CellReference) returns an instance, and the DataValidationConstraint.ValidationType is DataValidationConstraint.ValidationType.LIST, return the valid values, whether they are from a static list or cell range.

        For all other validation types, or no validation at all, this method returns null.

        This method could throw an exception if the validation type is not LIST, but since this method is mostly useful in UI contexts, null seems the easier path.

        (如果getGuardationForCell（CellReference）返回实例，并且DataGuardationBindition.ValidationType为DataGuardationBindition.ValidationType. RST，则返回有效值，无论它们来自静态列表还是单元格范围。对于所有其他验证类型，或者根本没有验证，此方法返回空。如果验证类型不是RST，此方法可能会引发异常，但由于此方法在UI上下文中最有用，因此空似乎是更容易的路径。)
        Parameters:
        cell - reference to check - use this in case the cell does not actually exist yet(单元格-要检查的引用-如果单元格实际上还不存在，请使用它)
        Returns:
        returns an unmodifiable List of ValueEvals if applicable, or null(返回不可修改的ValueEvals列表（如果适用），或空)

      • getValidationValuesForConstraint

        protected static java.util.List<ValueEval> getValidationValuesForConstraint(DataValidationEvaluator.DataValidationContext context)
        static so enums can reference it without creating a whole instance(静态的，因此枚举可以引用它，而无需创建整个实例)
        Returns:
        returns an unmodifiable List of ValueEvals, which may be empty(返回不可修改的ValueEvals列表，该列表可能为空)

      • isValidCell

        public boolean isValidCell(CellReference cellRef)
        Use the validation returned by getValidationForCell(CellReference) if you want the error display details. This is the validation checked by this method, which attempts to replicate Excel's data validation rules.

        Note that to properly apply some validations, care must be taken to offset the base validation formula by the relative position of the current cell, or the wrong value is checked.

        (如果您想要显示错误详细信息，请使用getGuardationForCell（CellReference）返回的验证。这是该方法检查的验证，该方法尝试复制Excel的数据验证规则。请注意，要正确应用某些验证，必须小心以当前单元格的相对位置抵消基本验证公式，否则将检查错误的值。)
        Parameters:
        cellRef - The reference of the cell to evaluate(cellRef -要评估的单元格的引用)
        Returns:
        true if the cell has no validation or the cell value passes the defined validation, false if it fails(如果单元格没有验证或单元格值通过了定义的验证，则为真，如果失败，则为假)

      • isType

        public static boolean isType(Cell cell,
                             CellType type)
        Note that this assumes the cell cached value is up to date and in sync with data edits(请注意，这假设单元格缓存的值是最新的并且与数据编辑同步)
        Parameters:
        cell - The Cell to check.(cell -要检查的细胞。)
        type - The CellType to check for.(type -要检查的CellType。)
        Returns:
        true if the cell or cached cell formula result type match the given type(如果单元格或缓存单元格公式结果类型匹配给定类型，则为真)
